category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ChangeSummaryColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Stores the column configuration for the change summary table for the current user. When user change visibility or order of column from change summary table, the updated information is store in this preference. This preference is populated internally and is not meant to be modified by users. To change the default column configuration for change summary table please update ChangeSummaryTableColumns preference.
